description: A sports equipment retailer focused on a wide range of sports. They started by selling American Football kits in the state of Virginia.

Happy Pursuits is a retailer selling bone density scanners for doctors and other medical practices. The scanners have been demonstrated to doctors and pitches as a handy quantum leap over standard X-rays.
Goldmill Gym is an American boxing gym chain with more than 300 clubs across the United States and Canada.
Tolkien's mission is to make the outdoors accessible and enjoyable to all.
BeasBoyz is a Tea Party Company specializing in renting a great assortment of china, flatware and glassware.
Royal Furs is a manufacturer, Importers and Wholesaler of the finest fur garments. Specializing in Lion, Hyena and Warthog.
Lost Diamonds is a cruise line brand founded organised as a wholly owned subsidiary. It also operates the four largest passenger ships in the world.

Cuckoo Hospital is a not-for-profit and full-service community hospital. Cuckoo offers medical, surgical, intensive care, obstetric, oncology, orthopaedic and skilled nursing inpatient services, as well as a 24-hour Emergency Department.
Thenardier Hospitality is an American multinational hospitality company that manages and franchises a broad portfolio of hotels and resorts.
Terrestrial is a private American aerospace manufacturer and space transportation services company.

Godfather Securities is an American multinational investment bank and financial services company headquartered in New York City. It offers services in investment management, securities, asset management, prime brokerage, and securities underwriting.
The Daily Bugle is a media organization, which engages in creating, collecting, and distributing news and information. It includes newspapers, print, and digital products, and mobile applications.
Han Dynasty is a technology and innovation leader specializing in defense, civil government and cybersecurity solutions.
